t: Disney Company | History, Movies, & Facts | Britannica Money
s: Disney Company is an American corporation best known as a purveyor of family entertainment in the 20th and 21st centuries. Among the company’s many intellectual properties are the cartoon character Mickey Mouse, Pixar Animation Studios, Marvel Entertainment, and the Star Wars films.
